metadata.name: Powershell Defender Exclusion
metadata.comment: Detects requests to exclude files, folders or processes from Antivirus scanning using PowerShell cmdlets

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-mppreference ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('set-mppreference '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -exclusionpath ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -exclusionextension ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -exclusionprocess ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -exclusionipaddress '))))

output.summary: Detects requests to exclude files, folders or processes from Antivirus scanning using PowerShell cmdlets

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Possible Admin Activity 2. Other Cmdlets that may use the same parameters References: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/defender-endpoint/configure-process-opened-file-exclusions-microsoft-defender-antivirus, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1562.001/T1562.001.md, https://twitter.com/AdamTheAnalyst/status/1483497517119590403
